title: 01/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP starts tp look ahead toward this weekend's playoff matchups. Which AFC team has the best shot at knocking off the Chiefs? Former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker joins us to discuss. Football Morning in America co-Host Nate Burelson zooms in and says if it weren't for Trevor Lawrence he'd consider Devonta Smith the top pick in this year's draft, he explains why. Plus, will James Harden finally push his way out of Houston? Whatsup with Kyrie Irving? Chris Mannix fills us in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP starts tp look ahead toward this weekend's playoff matchups. Which AFC team has the best shot at knocking off the Chiefs? Former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker joins us to discuss. Football Morning in America co-Host Nate Burelson zooms in and says if it weren't for Trevor Lawrence he'd consider Devonta Smith the top pick in this year's draft, he explains why. Plus, will James Harden finally push his way out of Houston? Whatsup with Kyrie Irving? Chris Mannix fills us in.
